counter_stamp_s: L150, April 26, 9, One Hundred Fifty Pounds, Stephen Minots, J Mascorens, H. Gardner
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Check issued as advance pay to officers.
issue_obverse_legend_s: State of Massachusetts Bay | April 26, 1779 | FOR Value received for the Use of the State of Massachusetts-Bay, I do in behalf of said State hereby promise and oblige Myself and Successors in the Office of Treasurer to pay the Possessor of this Note the Sum of One Hundred Fifty Pounds by the First Day of January 1780, with Interest at Six per Cent per Annum. -Interest to commence on the Fifteenth Day of April 1779. Witness my Hand. H. Gardner, Treasurer | DEATH TO COUNTERFEIT THIS.
